title.narrative: Development of Value Chains for Products derived from Genetic Resources in Compliance with the Nagoya Protocol on Access and Benefit Sharing and the National Biodiversity Economy Strategy

description.narrative: To strengthen value chains for products derived from genetic resources that contribute to the equitable sharing of benefits and the conservation of biodiversity, with a focus on bioprospecting of indigenous plant species.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Environmental Affairs University of Pretoria Council for Scientific and Industrial Research
